page.title: 14Woodchurch C.E. School
page.content: Woodchurch C.E. Primary School was built in 1844 and extended in 1872. Added to the school are 2 mobiles, a new playground, an outdoor swimming pool and a carpark.A new hall is to be started soon.Woodchurch school is on the Bethersden Road next to the parish church.There are 4 classrooms .There are 106 children altogether in the school. You start school at 4 and three quarters and finish at nearly 12 years old.It is a school for boys and girls.There are 4 fulltime teachers and 2 part_time teachers.There is 1 secretary,2 cleaners and 5 ladies serving and supervising school lunches which costs 60p each.Other people come to school to teach music.There are 3 terms totalling 39 weeks.School starts at 9.00 am.,and finishes at 3.3 pm. each weekday.We do cycling proficiency and inter-school sports.
